name: Guru
overview:
Guru is the world’s best online marketplace for freelance talent.

A Little About Guru We are committed to the success of our members. We dedicate our time to advancements that improve user experience and raise the bar for better reliability. With the help of our community, we serve to grow, enhance and support independent entrepreneurialism and the remote, virtual office.

Guru for Businesses We provide businesses with the ability to find the help they need from a variety of talented Freelancers worldwide. Our proprietary Guru Recommends System leverages performance data to make the freelancer selection process easy and reliable - every time. Once connected, Employers can securely pay Freelancers through our SafePay system. By using SafePay, Employers are guaranteed payment protection.

Guru for Freelancers For Freelancers, we offer the opportunity to market sought-after skills to a global audience with minimal cost. Innovative features, such as online Portfolios, give Freelancers a cutting edge platform on which to highlight their skills and experiences in attracting or retaining business. Quality Score data teaches Freelancers about their personal strengths and weaknesses so that every service provider on our site has support in becoming a successful free agent - an online entrepreneur with a core market niche.
